name: Before I go (klaiis)
description:
Content warning: family arguments , disagreements and neglect 

A short non-linear interactive fiction about a rogue planet about to leave it's orbit. Features 2k words (10~ mins gameplay) with 2 endings.

Done in a week for an art challenge/game jam.  

Song:  Hope by C418
I do not own this song please support C418 by going to their bandcamp.
